!4 User permission tests
 * '''Case 1''': A user must only be able to '''create''' records with permission units matching the user itself
 * '''Case 2''': A user must only be able to '''update''' records with permission units matching the user itself
 	* 2a: A user must only be able to '''update''' records with permission units matching the user itself
 	* 2b: A user must only be able to '''update''' records to include a permission unit matching one of the user's permission units
 * '''Case 3''': A user must only be able to '''delete''' records with permission units matching the user itself
